reviews.customers_say: Customers love the sweater's style, with one noting its high-end feel, and appreciate its soft, beautiful fabric that feels good on the skin.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Luxurious feel and look
items.body: This sweater feels like luxury, so soft, absolutely beautiful. The scalloped neck and sleeves are so pretty. Definitely buy this. Fit is true to size. It's warm too. Read more
items.author: alecia hansen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater!
items.body: This sweater was even better than I thought. The taupe color is absolutely perfect. And it is so soft, warm and cozy. I love the scalloped cuffs and bottom. Very happy with my purchase! Read more
items.author: Lauren C.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fits small. Need to up size
items.body: Really loved it. I had got a bigger size to make it flowy. They run small so I would have had to get two sizes up and then the arms would of been too long but in general it’s very nice and cute. Read more
items.author: Jenny Privat

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Incredible sweater
items.body: Fits TTS, very well made sweater. It looks good and feels good! Read more
items.author: Amy Kocsis

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm and Cozy
items.body: This sweater is the warm and comfy sweater that is perfect for a cold day. It's very comfortable and super cute (just like the picture). It's a nice, thick sweater. Read more
items.author: Jay SB

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s cute and soft but definitely not off shoulder.
items.body: I bought this thinking it was off shoulder. It most certainly is not. That being said, it’s still super soft and cuddly so I’ll keep it but I would be lying if I wasn’t disappointed. Read more
items.author: Nicolette S

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater!!!!
items.body: Beautiful sweater!!! I am 5’1”, 119lbs. and ordered a small. It’s perfectly oversized. The v neck is not too high up but not over the shoulder. That’s just how the model shows the way she wore it. (Probably slightly larger on her). I’ve only worn it a couple of times and have gotten nice compliments. I recommend ordering the size reflected in the size guide for your height and weight. Read more
items.author: JP

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great top
items.body: Love the fit and the feel. Colors are vibrant and smooth. Love this top very warm and comfortable. Read more
items.author: Marsha Hall

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Blue, Light Brown, Lavender Purple, Pink, Beige, Beige - Flower, Light Green, Black, Light G Taupe, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
